info.brief_description: This is my original work, either made for commissions or as one offs
info.description:
Hey everyone.

Thank you so much for viewing my page, favoriting, watching me, everything. It means the world to me. This will be an interactive that I will be writing exclusively. All material in this will be my own. Some will connect to others, but many will be one off stories that I feel like writing in the moment. All of my work that isn't specifically meant to be in one place or for one person is here.

I have decided to open myself up to commissions. I will still be writing at least one story every week, but I will also make sure that every commission that comes in is done before I work on the 1 every week. I won't have a limit at this point to how many I will take on. I can normally write and edit 1000 in an hour and a half, but this doesn't mean I can always write every story in the same amount of time. At this moment, this is not a job for me, this is something I enjoy doing that I would love to do more of, but I need money if I am going to do this more often.

What I will do:
As I hope to continue to show and as I have already done before, I want my list of what I will do to be as broad as possible. My content has normally been, shall we say, risque but I can also write other material as well that wouldn't involve none safe for work content. As well, the list of fetishes and kinks that I can write about have been expansive before, as my fiance can attest to. Whether it is fantastical beings or just a couples first night, I can write a lot. If you have questions, please feel free to ask.

What I won't do:
All of that having been said, there is still content that I will not do. I have written things in the past that I now regret and I will not do them again. I will reserve the right to refuse anything and may make this list longer or shorter as I either learn to broaden into new areas or find new things that I won't write. As of now, what I will not write is as follows,
Pedophilia (sexual content between characters of any age below 18)
Extreme pain
Cannibalism
Vomit

Prices:
As of right now, these prices are set as an assistance to my income to help with bills and food for my fiance and myself. This is not my job and I do have a limited amount of time that I can dedicate each day. My prices will be fixed by word count. For every increment of 1000 words, the price is $15 USD. I do not accept points commissions. I will add to other stories as well.

On a side note, I should also mention that I will probably be posting most stories that I write in parts here, as I have a character limit of 10,000 words. If you want to read them as they get updated in 10,000 word increments, or if I need to take a break and post something not finished, I will have that here and mark that they are separated as well as trying to cut the story at an appropriate time.

As I have said, I will still write. I won't stop writing until such a time that I can no longer write. This is for me to bring more to you and to bring what you specifically ask for. Mixing and matching any content I have produced, something you haven't seen me do that isn't on my 'no' list, I'm open and willing. Contact me if you are interested. Thank you in advance for everything.

All of my work here will also be on my DeviantArt and any other sites that I post to
